title: 1984 Overseas Final
text:
The 1984 Overseas Final was the fourth running of the <a href="Overseas%20Final">Overseas Final</a> as part of the qualification for the <a href="1984%20Individual%20Speedway%20World%20Championship">1984 Speedway World Championship</a> Final to be held at the <a href="Ullevi">Ullevi</a> Stadium in <a href="G%C3%B6teborg">Göteborg</a>, <a href="Sweden">Sweden</a>. The 1984 Final was run on 8 July at <a href="Hyde%20Road%20%28speedway%29">Belle Vue</a> in <a href="Manchester">Manchester</a>, <a href="England">England</a>, and was the second last qualifying round for <a href="Commonwealth%20of%20Nations">Commonwealth</a> and <a href="United%20States%20of%20America">American</a> riders.
The top 10 riders qualified for the <a href="1984%20Intercontinental%20Final">Intercontinental Final</a> to be held at the <a href="Vojens%20Speedway%20Center">Speedway Center</a> in <a href="Vojens">Vojens</a>, <a href="Denmark">Denmark</a>. <a href="Lance%20King%20%28speedway%20rider%29">Lance King</a> became the first <a href="Americans">American</a> rider to win the Overseas Final, winning with an unbeaten 15 point maximum.
